scripts.build: npm-run-all -s build:css build:index compile:templates compile:aot build:js
scripts.watch: npm-run-all --parallel compile:aot compile:templates watch:css watch:templates watch:js

scriptsInfo.build:index: Casts index.pug layout into index.html template to act as app entry file
scriptsInfo.compile:templates: Casts pugs folder, that has layout files like template.pug, into TypeScript compatible template.pug.ts files
scriptsInfo.watch:templates: Watches pugs folder for changes to engage the script compile:templates
scriptsInfo.compile:aot: Compiles TypeScript source files, Ahead of Time to reduce load times, to output folder
scriptsInfo.build:js: Builds one TypeScript source file into a final www output file. Node memory has been increased to cover large app builds
scriptsInfo.watch:js: Builds one TypeScript source file into a final www output file. Node memory has been increased to cover large app builds
scriptsInfo.build:css: Builds one SASS source file into a final css output file
scriptsInfo.watch:css: Builds one SASS source file into a final css output file
scriptsInfo.build: Builds TypeScript files to output folder
scriptsInfo.watch: Employes other watch script to particpate in a combined
scriptsInfo.compile:prefx: Creates resusable Angular animations defintions file that is compatible with AoT compilation
